title: $:/plugins/xp/diary
name: Diary
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/xp/dailynotes/AddTodo":{"title":"$:/xp/dailynotes/AddTodo","text":"\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/ \define add-todo-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[get[todo-name]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{{ [[$:/gtd/]addsuffix] }}} $savetitle="$:/temp/projectify/new-todo" tags="GTD" caption={{{ [get[todo-name]] }}} due=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/temp/projectify/new-todo}} $tags={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag}}/> <$reveal state="$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/ContentType" type="match" text="text/x-markdown"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/temp/projectify/new-todo}} type="text/x-markdown"/> <$action-listops $tiddler={{$:/config/xp/aggregation-gtd/QuadrantTag}} $subfilter={{$:/temp/projectify/new-todo}}/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> todo-name qtag /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> \end \define cancel-input-actions() <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> todo-name /> <$vars stateTiddler="$:/temp/gtd/add-todo/sidebar">
<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<>> <$edit-text class="xp-gtd-addtodo-textbox-input" tiddler=<> field="todo-name" placeholder="Add todo..." />
<$list filter="[get[todo-name]trim[]!is[blank]]" variable="ignore" storyview="pop"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiny-gap-left" actions=<> tooltip="Add new item" aria-label="new item" > {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$vars currentTiddler=<>> <$transclude tiddler="$:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/SideBar/TodoQuadrant" mode="inline"/>
"},"$:/DailyNotes":{"title":"$:/DailyNotes","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/daily","text":"\define today() <> \end \define today-chinese() <> \end

filter="[subfilter] -[subfilter]" fields="tbl-expand title tags" class="w-100" editButton=no emptyMessage=" " importFileActions() <$action-popup $state=<> $coords="(0,0,0,0)" $floating="yes"/> \end \define inputAcceptActions() <$list filter="[!tag]" variable="ignore"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags=<>/> <$list filter="[!class[journal]]" variable="ignore"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> class="journal"/> \end \define excludeEditorButtons() $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/transcludify $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/inc $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/excise $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/editor-height $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate \end <$set name="edit-preview-state" value={{{ [{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}!match[yes]then[$:/state/showeditpreview]] :else[] }}}> <$vars importTitle=<> importState=<> journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$link to=<>/><$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="Private"> Private<$checkbox tiddler=<> tag="Star"> Star <$dropzone importTitle=<> autoOpenOnImport="no" contentTypesFilter={{$:/config/Editor/ImportContentTypesFilter}} class="tc-dropzone-editor" enable={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} filesOnly="yes" actions=<> ><$reveal stateTitle=<> type="match" text="yes" tag="div"><$tiddler tiddler=<>>

<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/editpreviewtype}} mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/preview/output" mode="inline"/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<> type="nomatch" text="yes" tag="div"> <$keyboard key="((input-accept-variant))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" placeholder="Type the text" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus="no" cancelPopups="yes" fileDrop={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} default="" inputActions=<> > <$set name="targetTiddler" value=<> ><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]remove]" ><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" ><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" ><$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" ><$transclude/> "},"$:/dailynotes-journallist":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-journallist","caption":"日记列表","text":"\whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/journals \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] [] [] [] [] []"/> \define defaultView() $:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView \define filterState() $:/state/filter/dailynotes \define encryptStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Encrypted \define privateStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Private \define starStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Starred \define dateStatus() $:/temp/filter/dailynotes/Date \define input-accept-actions-date() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> filter={{{ [get[text]addprefixaddsuffix] }}}/> \define cancel-datefilter-actions() <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> text/> \define toggleViewButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="list" type="nomatch" text="card"> <$button tooltip="Switching to card view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="card"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="card"> <$button tooltip="Switching to list view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="list"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} \end \define resetConditionButton() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[has[text]] [has[text]] [has[text]] [is[tiddler]] [has[filter]] +[limit[1]]">  <$button class="xp-aggrfilter-dynamic-btn"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[] [] [] []"/> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> filter/> reset \end \define dnTiddlerControls() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[all[current]has[text]]"> <$button to=<> tooltip="Open this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/link}} <$list filter="[all[current]!tag[Star]]"> <$button actions="<$action-listops $tags='Star'/>" tooltip="Star this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/xp/images/star}} <$list filter="[all[current]tag[Star]]"> <$button actions="<$action-listops $tags='-Star'/>" tooltip="Unstar this tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible">{{$:/core/images/star-filled}} <$list filter="$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit" storyview="pop" variable="listItem"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> \end <$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$list filter="[taglimit[1]]" emptyMessage="{{$:/aggregation/prompt}}" variable="ignore"> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> class="py-input input-larger" type="search" tag="input" filterMinLength="1" focus={{$:/config/xp/aggregation/SearchAutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]has[text]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-search-journals input"""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="yes"/> {{$:/xp/images/filter}} <> <$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} encryptRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} privateRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} starRun={{{ [get[text]] }}} timeRun={{{ [get[filter]] }}} limitRun=" +[limit[250]]" resultCount="<$count filter=<>/>" journalSearch="[tag!sort[created]search:*]"> <$set name="searchFilter" value={{{ [addsuffix[ ]addsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffixaddsuffix] }}}> <$set name="stateTiddler" filter="[!is[missing]get[text]trim[]!is[blank]]" value=<> emptyValue=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="yes" animate="yes"> <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="yes" animate="yes">
Filter conditions: <>
<$list filter="[taghas[encrypted]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[tagtag[Private]limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[tagtag[Star]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">
Encrypted <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value=" +[has[encrypted]]"> yes <$radio field="text" value=" +[!has[encrypted]]"> no

Starred <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio field="text" value=" +[tag[Star]]"> yes <$radio field="text" value=" +[!tag[Star]]"> no

<$transclude/>
"},"$:/plugins/xp/diary/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/xp/diary/icon","text":""},"$:/plugins/xp/diary/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/xp/diary/readme","text":"Show journal list in sidebar for easy access to DAILY NOTES. 如果「每日一记」是你的习惯或者主需求，那么可以将 $:/DailyNotes 添加到 $:/DefaultTiddlers 中，设为默认条目。 !! 依赖插件 * $:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler（提供加密功能） 如果使用 $:/DailyNotes，那么还需要安装以下插件（不使用可不安装）： * $:/plugins/xp/aggregation-gtd ** $:/plugins/xp/aggregation ** $:/plugins/nico/projectify ** $:/plugins/nico/projectify-zh-Hans ** $:/plugins/kookma/todolist * $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz !! 其他说明 关于 Daily Notes，可以参照网上的这个案例： * https://www.techlifeweb.com/tiddlywiki/dailynotes.html ** https://github.com/akhater/Daily-Notes-for-TW5 "},"$:/_tw5.com-card-template":{"title":"$:/_tw5.com-card-template","text":"\define tw-card-template(bordercolor:"")
<$link>
<$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
<$list filter="[is[current]has[community-author]]">by {{!!community-author}}

<$view field="description"/>

\end <$macrocall $name="tw-card-template" bordercolor={{!!color}}/>"},"$:/_tw5.com-styles":{"title":"$:/_tw5.com-styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline macrocallblock .tc-double-spaced-list li { padding-bottom: .5em; padding-top: .5em; } .tc-link-info-item { border: 1px solid #ebefcd; padding: 5px 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: <>; font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.2; } .tc-link-info-item h1 { font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; } .tc-scrollable-demo { border: 1px solid <>; background-color: <>; padding: 1em; height: 400px; position: relative; overflow: auto; } .tc-improvement-banner { font-size: 0.7em; background: #fcc; padding-left: 5px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 12px; <> } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { } } @media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { margin-right: -53px; margin-left: -53px; } .tc-improvement-banner:before { display: block; position: absolute; width: 0; height: 0; content: " "; margin-left: -5px; margin-top: -10px; border-top: 5px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid #C07E7E; border-bottom: 5px solid #C07E7E; } } .tc-improvement-banner svg { width: 1em; height: 1em; } .tc-wrapper-flex { display: flex; } .tc-saving-sidebar { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-width: 200px; overflow: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { display: block; } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-wrapper-flex { flex-direction: column; } .tc-saving-sidebar { width: 100%; height: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { float: left; } } .tc-saving-sidebar-category { margin-bottom: 10px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-title { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 16px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-item { margin-left: 10px; } .tc-card { margin: 15px; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 10px; border-top: 5px solid #45D3D3; box-shadow: 0 8px 17px -8px #A3A5AE; background-color: #FFF; width: 200px; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px; } .tc-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } .tc-card:hover .tc-card-title { color: #1462ff; } .tc-card-title { text-align: center; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: 600; transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px 0; } .tc-card-author { text-align: right; } .tc-card p { height: 67px; overflow: hidden; margin: 0; padding: 13px 0; } .tc-card a { color: #222; } .tc-card a:hover { text-decoration:none; } .tc-card a:active, .tc-card a:focus, .tc-btn-download:active, .tc-btn-download:focus{ outline: none; } div.content { padding: 1px 16px; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; } .tc-btn-download { width: 250px; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; background: #1462ff; border-radius: 5px; border: none; box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 #4a74c9; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.4em; color: #fff; fill: #fff; } .tc-btn-download:active { background: #1475ff; }"},"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Actions/new-journal","description":"create a new journal tiddler","rewrite":"5.2.3","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags!!tags}} journalText={{$:/config/NewJournal/Text}}> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text={{{ [get[]] }}}/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=""> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags=<> text=<> class="journal"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal","description":"create a new private journal tiddler","tags":"$:/tags/Actions","text":"\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$ $(tagsFieldTags)$ $(privateTextFieldTags)$ $(privateTagsFieldTags)$ \whitespace trim <$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}} tagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags!!tags}} privateTextFieldTags={{$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags}} privateTagsFieldTags={{$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags!!tags}} journalText={{$:/config/NewJournal/Text}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags=<> text=<> class="journal" color="#5e36bf"/> <$list filter="[[Private]!has[title]]"> <$action-createtiddler $basetitle="Private" tags="Private" color="#5e36bf"/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view","text":"\whitespace trim <$button to="$:/DiaryCard" tooltip="Card view" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/diarycard}} <$text text="card view"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/encrypt-private-journals":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/encrypt-private-journals","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/private}} encrypt private journals","description":"Encrypt private journals","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip="Encrypt private journals" aria-label="encrypt private journals" class=<>> <$action-navigate $to="$:/EncryptPrivateJournals"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/private}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="encrypt private journals"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions","caption":"{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} more journal actions","description":"More actions","text":"\define config-title() $:/config/PageControlButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$button popup=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}} selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/More/Caption}}/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$set name="tv-config-toolbar-icons" value="yes"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-text" value="yes"> <$list filter="$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-image $:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal $:/xp/ui/Buttons/encrypt-private-journals $:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline $:/xp/diary/Buttons/card-view" variable="listItem"> <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" filter="[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
"},"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-private-journal","caption":"{{$:/xp/images/newprivate}} New private journal","description":"New private journal","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip="Create a new private journal" aria-label="new private journal" class=<> actions={{$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-private-journal}}> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/newprivate}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="new private journal"/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Buttons/show-timeline","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/config/Diary/timeline]get[text]] +[else[hide]!match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button set="$:/config/Diary/timeline" setTo="show" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$text text="show timeline"/> <$list filter="[[$:/config/Diary/timeline]get[text]] +[else[hide]match[show]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class=<>> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/config/Diary/timeline"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$text text="hide timeline"/> "},"$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Diary":{"title":"$:/xp/ui/SideBar/Diary","caption":"Diary","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/diary","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim \define journal-timeline(limit:"100",format:"DDth MMM YYYY",subfilter:"",dateField:"created")
<$list filter="[tag!is[system]!has[draft.of]$subfilter$has[$dateField$]!sort[$dateField$]limit[$limit$]eachday[$dateField$]]">
<$reveal state="$:/config/Diary/timeline" type="match" text="show"> <$view field="$dateField$" format="date" template="$format$"/> <$list filter="[tagsameday:$dateField${!!$dateField$}!is[system]!has[draft.of]$subfilter$!sort[$dateField$]]" template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate" />
\end <$set name="tv-config-toolbar-class" value=""> {{$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-journal}} <$button to="$:/EncryptJournals" tooltip="Encrypt journals" class="tc-tiny-gap-left"> {{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}} <$button to="$:/DailyNotes" tooltip="Daily Notes" class="tc-tiny-gap"> {{$:/xp/images/daily}} {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/more-journal-actions}} <$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}>
//<$count filter=<>/> journals//
<> "},"$:/DiaryCard":{"title":"$:/DiaryCard","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/diarycard","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ \define cancel-search-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/temp/journalsearch/input}!match{$:/temp/journalsearch}]" emptyMessage="""<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[[$:/temp/journalsearch]] [[$:/temp/journalsearch/input]] [[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]]" />"""><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}/><$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> \define input-accept-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$action-navigate $to={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \define input-accept-variant-actions() <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="""<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]"><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"""><$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>
<>. [[Filtering journals|$:/help/FilteringJournals]]
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/JournalFilter]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude mode="inline"/>
<$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" storeTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch" refreshTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" selectionStateTitle="$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item" type="search" tag="input" configTiddlerFilter="[[$:/temp/journalsearch]]" firstSearchFilterField="text" inputAcceptActions=<> inputAcceptVariantActions=<> inputCancelActions=<>/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/DiaryCard/FilterButton]!has[draft.of]]"><$transclude/>
<$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$reveal state="$:/temp/journalsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$reveal state="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" type="nomatch" text="yes"> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}/>">
<>
<$list filter={{$:/temp/journalsearch}}> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> {{||$:/xp/diary/card-template}}
<$reveal state="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" type="match" text="yes"> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter=<>/>">
<>
<$list filter=<>> addsuffix[-primaryList]] -[[$:/temp/journalsearch/selected-item]get[text]] +[then[]else[tc-list-item-selected]] }}}> {{||$:/xp/diary/card-template}}
"},"$:/EncryptJournals":{"title":"$:/EncryptJournals","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/core/images/locked-padlock","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim <$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password1" placeholder="password" type="password" default="" col="4"/> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password2" placeholder="confirm password" type="password" default="" col="4" class="tc-tiny-gap"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2" filter=<>> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" class="tc-tiny-gap"> Encrypt <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler"> Decrypt <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter=<>/>">
//<> journals// <$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate"/>
"},"$:/EncryptPrivateJournals":{"title":"$:/EncryptPrivateJournals","color":"#bbb","icon":"$:/xp/images/private","text":"\import $:/xp/diary/macros \whitespace trim <$vars journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}}> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password1" placeholder="password" type="password" default="" col="4"/> <$edit-text tag="input" tiddler="$:/temp/password2" placeholder="confirm password" type="password" default="" col="4" class="tc-tiny-gap"/> <$encryptTiddler passwordTiddler1="$:/temp/password1" passwordTiddler2="$:/temp/password2" filter=<>> <$button message="tw-encrypt-tiddler" class="tc-tiny-gap"> Encrypt <$button message="tw-decrypt-tiddler"> Decrypt <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter=<>/>">
//<> private journals// <$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/danielo515/encryptTiddler/ui/listItemTemplate"/>
"},"$:/xp/diary/Filter/FilterButtons/clear":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filter/FilterButtons/clear","tags":"$:/tags/DiaryCard/FilterButton","text":"\whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/temp/journalsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} "},"$:/help/FilteringJournals":{"title":"$:/help/FilteringJournals","text":"\define sort-asc-svg() \end \define sort-desc-svg() \end \define sort-num-svg() \end 显示所有日记条目（标签为 Journal 的条目）^^（[[tag Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/tag%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]]` 显示某年某月某日@@color:#03a9f4;创建@@的日记条目^^（[[regexp Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/regexp%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^2021]]` > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^202105]]` > `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^20210507]]` 显示在某天@@color:#03a9f4;创建@@的日记条目^^（[[sameday Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/sameday%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]sameday:created[20210507]]` 显示在多少天内@@color:#03a9f4;创建或者修改@@的日记条目，比如最近一周^^（[[days Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/days%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]days:created[-7]]` //七天内创建的日记条目// > `[tag[Journal]!days:created[-7]]` //七天前创建的日记条目// > `[tag[Journal]days[-7]]` //七天内修改的日记条目// 显示最近@@color:#03a9f4;修改@@的日记条目，比如最近的 3 条修改^^（[[has Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/has%2520Operator.html]] / [[limit Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/limit%2520Operator.html]]）^^： > `[tag[Journal]has[modified]limit[3]]` 显示已@@color:#03a9f4;加密@@日记条目： > `[tag[Journal]has[encrypted]]` !! 排序,,（[[sort Operator|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/sort%2520Operator.html]]）,, 默认按字段 title 升序排序 <>，您可以对显示结果进行重新排序。 按字段 title 降序排序 <>： > `[tag[Journal]!sort[]]` 按字段 created / modified 降序排序 <>： > `[tag[Journal]!sort[created]]` > `[tag[Journal]!sort[modified]]` !! 剔除 如果显示结果中存在多余的条目，可以将其剔除。 剔除系统条目： > `[tag[Journal]!is[system]]` == `[tag[Journal]!prefix[$:/]]` 剔除草稿条目： > `[tag[Journal]!has[draft.of]]` 剔除含有 test 标签的条目： > `[tag[Journal]!tag[test]]` !! 组合使用 `[tag[Journal]regexp:created[^2021]!is[system]!sort[created]]` 这个运行块含有四个步骤，从左至右开始执行： # 显示含有 Journal 标签的所有 [[non-shadow|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/ShadowTiddlers.html]] 条目； # 只显示 2021 年创建的条目； # 如果有 `$:/` 开头的系统条目，则将其剔除； # 最后根据 created 降序排序。 更多内容请访问 [[Filters|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Filters.html]]、[[Filter Operators|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/Filter%2520Operators.html]]。"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals","description":"All journals","filter":"[tag!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"''Common filters:'' "},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals","description":"Encrypted journals","filter":"[taghas[encrypted]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate","description":"Filter by date (Ex: 20210507)","filter":"[tagregexp:created[^2021]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals","description":"Private journals","filter":"[tagtag[Private]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals","description":"Recently modified","filter":"[tag!is[system]!sort[modified]limit[14]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/SearchJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/SearchJournals","description":"Turn on Search Mode","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{!!description}} aria-label={{!!description}}> Search <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode" text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text=""/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-diarycard-search input"""/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals","description":"Starred journals","filter":"[tagtag[Star]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"/* 自定义日志条目的样式 */ [data-tags*="Journal"], [data-tiddler-title="Diary"] { border-radius: 8px; } [data-tags*="Private"] { border: 1px solid rgba(94, 54, 191, 0.39); } @media print { .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 60px; margin-top: 25px; } .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper { padding-left: 60px; } } @media screen { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 20px; } } @media screen and (max-width: 960px) { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 30px; } } .journal:before { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 3px; width: 37px; background: radial-gradient(<> 4px, transparent 5px) repeat-y; background-size: 30.4px 30.4px; z-index: 1010; } .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-top: 6px; font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; line-height: 2em; color: <>; } /* Setting font for other elements */ .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre, .journal .tc-tiddler-body code, .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre code { font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; }"},"$:/xp/diary/card-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/card-template","text":"\define tw-card-template(bordercolor:"")
<$link>
<$list filter="[all[current]has[encrypted]]">{{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}}
<$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
<$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY 0MM0DD"/>

<$transclude field="text"/>

\end <$macrocall $name="tw-card-template" bordercolor={{!!color}}/>"},"$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags","text":"Private"},"$:/xp/images/diary":{"title":"$:/xp/images/diary","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/diarycard":{"title":"$:/xp/images/diarycard","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/newprivate":{"title":"$:/xp/images/newprivate","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/private":{"title":"$:/xp/images/private","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/diary/macros":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/macros","text":"\define journalFilter() [tag!is[system]!has[draft.of]!sort[created]] \end \define privateJournalFilter() [tagtag[Private]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!sort[created]] \end \define journalSearchFilter() [tag!is[system]!sort[created]search{$:/temp/journalsearch}] \end \define commonFilters(name) \whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{!!description}} aria-label={{!!description}} class="tc-tiny-gap-right"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch" text={{!!filter}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text={{!!filter}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> $name$ \end 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/tags/JournalFilter":{"title":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","list":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters $:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate $:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals"}}}
